title: "Peptide Harnesses Analgesic Potential of Cannabinoids Avoiding Amnesic Side Effects"
excerpt: "Scientists have developed a peptide candidate for reducing the cognitive side effects of pain treatment with cannabis derivatives. The peptide works by decoupling cannabinoid and serotonin receptor mediated signaling."
